channel.title: Need help with connecting please READ!
channel.description: ok so i use a client that doesnt have a file>server ip thing and i was wondering how to change the ip so my friends can play? PLEASE be as specific as possible dont just say its in client.JAVA Tell me WHERE and WHAT to put in! please i really need your help. ]:

item.title: Need help with connecting please READ!
item.dc:creator: @hawkfrost57 hawkfrost57
item.description:
@hawkfrost57 wrote:

what the heck does that mean? please be sepcific! Im brand new to this stuff dumb it down for me i dont know what string means… or any of that…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 01:13:39 pm[/size][hr]damn can u put it back in server help nobody looks in cleint help all the people who actually DO SOMETHING are up in server help! GODDAMMIT

Read full topic

item.description:

Also, not related to servers, moved to Client help.
